name: Cartwheel Mania
description:
Do cartwheels as long as possible by collecting the right food and turning around when you have enough energy. But watch out, if you eat to much wrong food your stomach won't be able to digest it and you will eventually throw up.

The best way to go as long as possible:
- jump or stay on the ground to collect as much good food as possible to gain energy
- do the same thing but to avoid bad food
- turn around when you have enough energy to prevent yourself from vomiting

Press the up arrow button or touch the right side of your screen to jump or to stay up in the air, press space or touch the left side of the screen to turn around if you have enough energy.
